name: Ball of Rage
description:
Hello anyone who is seeing this. I want to thank you for checking my game out. This is my very first game I have made, so I would really appreciate it if you tried my game and gave me some pointers in the comments. (:

This is a game where you play as a ball who has to get to the top of the map to beat the game. The game is designed to be hard and to make you RAGE. So please don't be mad at me, be mad at the game. I recommend you play the game with music to make the game more casual.
